state_analysis: The command to kill the Docker container has also timed out, indicating that there may be critical issues with the Docker service or the host environment itself. The terminal remains in a non-responsive state, preventing any command execution.
explanation: In this situation, it is advised to access the Docker host directly (if possible) and check the status of the Docker service. If access is available, I will provide commands to restart the Docker service and remove any problematic containers directly from the host system.
